meaningMnemonic: You see some <radical>windows</radical>... you have a <radical>gun</radical>. What do you think you're going to do with this gun? Of course, you're going to shoot the windows... <kanji>every</kanji> single one of them. <kanji>Each</kanji> and every one.
readingMnemonic: Now that <kanji>each</kanji> and <kanji>every</kanji> window is broken you feel pretty stupid because a bunch of <reading>mi</reading>ce (まい) come pouring in through them. You've made a way for them to get into your house. That wasn't smart.
